SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwMorroDefaultQuestScript

;Various settings for Morroblivion
short QuestMarkersEnabled
short HardcoreHarvestMuck
short HardcoreHarvestOre
short TauntEnabled
short FastTravelEnabled
short ErrorDetection

short RestoreGMST
long OldControl
long OldControl2

begin GameMode

;=============================================================================
;The following block is part of the system to display dynamic text in dialogue
;=============================================================================

	if RestoreGMST

		SetStringGameSettingEX "sPCControlsTextPrefix|push"
		SetAltControl 18 OldControl
		SetAltControl 19 OldControl2
		SetStringGameSettingEX "sMouseButton7|Button 7"

		set RestoreGMST to 0

	endif

;===================================================================
;The following block automatically corrects PlayerInMorrowind global
;===================================================================


	if Player.GetInWorldspace WrldMorrowind == 1 || Player.GetInCell Mournhold == 1
		if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
			set PlayerInMorrowind to 1
		endif
	elseif Player.GetInWorldspace Tamriel == 1 || GetPlayerInSEWorld == 1
		if PlayerInMorrowind == 1
			set PlayerInMorrowind to 0
		endif
	endif

;===============================================================================
;The block below handles display of Morroblivion stats in player Misc Stat menu.
;Will do nothing if AddActorValues OBSE plugin is not installed.
;===============================================================

	if IsPluginInstalled "AddActorValues" == 0
		return
	else
		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVSlavesFreed base ) != FreedSlavesCounter )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVSlavesFreed base FreedSlavesCounter
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVSlavesFreed base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVSlavesFreed
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVSlavesFreed
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVThreadsWebspinner base ) != ThreadsWebspinner )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVThreadsWebspinner base ThreadsWebspinner
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVThreadsWebspinner base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVThreadsWebspinner
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVThreadsWebspinner
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepHT base ) != fbmwHTAdvancement.TelvanniReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepHT base fbmwHTAdvancement.TelvanniReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepHT base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepHT
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepHT
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepHH base ) != fbmwHHAdvancement.HlaaluReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepHH base fbmwHHAdvancement.HlaaluReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepHH base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepHH
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepHH
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepHR base ) != fbmwHRAdvancement.RedoranReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepHR base fbmwHRAdvancement.RedoranReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepHR base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepHR
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepHR
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepMG base ) != fbmwMGAdvancement.MageReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepMG base fbmwMGAdvancement.MageReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepMG base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepMG
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepMG
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepFG base ) != fbmwFGAdvancement.FighterReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepFG base fbmwFGAdvancement.FighterReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepFG base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepFG
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepFG
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepTG base ) != fbmwTGAdvancement.ThiefReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepTG base fbmwTGAdvancement.ThiefReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepTG base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepTG
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepTG
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepIL base ) != fbmwILAdvancement.LegionReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepIL base fbmwILAdvancement.LegionReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepIL base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepIL
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepIL
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepIC base ) != fbmwICAdvancement.CultReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepIC base fbmwICAdvancement.CultReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepIC base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepIC
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepIC
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepTT base ) != fbmwTTAdvancement.TempleReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepTT base fbmwTTAdvancement.TempleReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepTT base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepTT
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepTT
			endif
		endif

		if eval (( Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepMT base ) != fbmwMTAdvancement.MTReputation )
			Player.SetAVModF mwAVRepMT base fbmwMTAdvancement.MTReputation
			if Player.GetAVModF mwAVRepMT base == 0
				SetQuestItem 0 mwAVRepMT
			else
				SetQuestItem 1 mwAVRepMT
			endif
		endif
	endif

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 727 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
